hitoQuantityRequired: Quantity can not be less than or equal to 0
cannotChangeStatus: The state can not be changed
cashedDateGreaterThanInvoiceDate: The payment date can not be less than the billing date
cashedDateGreaterThanToday: Payment date can not be greater than the date of the day
cashedDateLessThanSolfacInvoiceDate: The payment date can not be less than the billing date
cashedDateLessThanSolfacStartDate: The payment date can not be less than the date of creation of the request
commentRequired: A reason for rejection must be added
errorSaveOnHitos: An error occurred when updating the milestone in the CRM
hitoUnitPriceRequired: Unit Price can not be less than or equal to 0
invoiceDateGreaterThanCashedDate: Billing date can not be greater than the payment date
invoiceDateGreaterThanToday: Billing date can not be longer than the date of the day
invoiceDateLessThanSolfacStartDate: Billing date can not be less than the Solfac start date
invoicedSuccess: The Solfac has been invoiced successfully
invoicePendingSuccess: The Solfac has been sent to the DAF successfully
managementControlRejectedSuccess: The Solfac has been rejected successfully
notFounds: No requests found with the selected search parameters.
pendingByManagementControlSuccess: The Solfac has been successfully sent to Management Control
percentageLessThan0: The sum of percentages can not be different than 100%
provinceRequired: The province is required if a percentage is included
timeLimitLessThan0: The time limit can not be less than 0
totalPercentageError: The sum of percentages can not be different than 100%
hitoDescriptionRequired: The description of the milestone is required
hitoQuantity: The amount of the milestone is required
creditNoteTotalExceeded: The total amount cannot exceeded the milestone.
